serviceDevelopmentDesc: Application development from scratch to deployment
serviceUIUXDesc: Design your application to your minimalist request or however you want it
serviceMaintenanceDesc: Continuous updates, bug fixing, and performance monitoring to keep your app running smoothly
contactSubtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's talk.
projectsSubtitle: A selection of my recent work
projDesc1: My personal portfolio built with Flutter Web. Responsive design, custom animations, and multi-language support.
projDesc2: E-commerce mobile app with payment gateway, cart management, and admin panel.
projDesc3: RESTful backend for task and user management, built with Node.js and MongoDB. JWT Authentication.
projDesc4: Real-time weather dashboard consuming OpenWeatherMap API. Interactive charts and geolocation.
